III â€“ Professional Expertise: I first started my career with a focus on sales management and on business development operations. After several years in France and in the United Kingdom, I invested in Sloane Group, a boutique business development management consulting firm. After over 5 years of management with MBA Center, I have become Chief Executive Officer in France. I aim at growing my portfolio of companies within the next decade. New projects I am involved in include 96Auto in the United Kingdom and Shadwellâ€™s Education in India. Like in every single think I do in my life, with high motivation, I intend to impose professional discipline and expertise in my companies. I am definitely result-oriented and innovative. All partners and stakeholders will witness my management style. With much confidence, I will strive to remain a proactive problem-solver, an energized leader and a virtue-seeking builder. My proven track record shows that I am a true problem-solver and a team player, with a dynamic entrepreneurial mind. Specialties

B2B Sales, International BDM, International Negotiation, Import and Export, Executive Education, Education Management, Financial Training, MBA Training and Coaching, Sino-European Business, Management of Profit Centers, Start-Up Operations and Management, Fundraising, S&OP, Networking (Linkedin & ASW).
